author: Staff Reporter
text:
Staff of various departments of the government who are on strike, demanding the government to accept and implement their 20 point demand, had staged a road roko in Tiruvannamalai and Cheyyar in this district on Tuesday. Totally, 1,366 of the protesters were arrested.

In Tiruvannamalai, 795 employees including 465 women were arrested and in Cheyyar 571 protesters including 328 women were arrested.

In Tiruvannamalai, when the employees were charging towards taluk office from Anna Statue police tried to prevent them at Periyar Statue. There was a brief altercation between police and protesters.

However, they were all released in the evening.
title: Over 1,300 government employees court arrest
